document_data.name: Royal Provisioners of Highmoon
document_data.mainbody: The '''Royal Provisioners of Highmoon''' was a provisions and supply store found in the city of [[Highmoon]] in [[Deepingdale]] just on the north side of the [[East Way]]. They offered quality goods for the caravans passing through the city, at the reasonable price of a 10% markup. These supplies included provisions, camping supplies, tack and harnesses and tools especially for traveling [[merchant]]s.
